entry.title: Tuesday: Clear. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Ice fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
